com.box.boxjavalibv2.resourcemanagers

Class BoxOAuthManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.box.boxjavalibv2.resourcemanagers.AbstractBoxResourceManager
      • com.box.boxjavalibv2.resourcemanagers.BoxOAuthManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBoxOAuthManager, IBoxResourceManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MockOAuthManager

    public class BoxOAuthManagerImpl
extends AbstractBoxResourceManager
implements IBoxOAuthManager
    API for OAuth. Full details about the Box API can be found at http://developers.box.com/docs

                                 BoxServerException,

        Parameters:
        code - The authorization code you retrieved previously used to create OAuth.
        clientId - client id
        clientSecret - client secret
        redirectUrl - optional, required only if a redirect URI is not configured at Box Developers Services, use null if don't want to supply this field.

        Throws:
